committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Acknowledging Major General Jesse Lee Reno and the 125th birthday of the city of Reno.

summary.text: Acknowledges the debt of gratitude that the Nation owes to the late Major General Jesse Lee Reno, U.S. Army. Joins with the Governor of Nevada in acknowledging May 8 and 9, 1993, as Celebration Reno, in honor of the 125th birthday of the founding of the city of Reno.

titles.title: Acknowledging Major General Jesse Lee Reno and the 125th birthday of the city of Reno.
